Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
I'm in charge of the animals 'round here.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
That chicken produces a lot of eggs, and that's
good, 'cause Miss Elise eats 'em every day.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
This is Miss Elise's farm, and it's private
property.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Miss Elise is a real generous lady.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Miss Elise's the boss 'round here. She gives the
orders, we take 'em.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Sometimes our lady don't make a whole lotta
sense. Well, she's still a young'un.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Is our lady gettin' softer these days, or is it just
me...?

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Miss Elise's different these days. She treats us
nicer, for one thing.

<NAME_MOB_CHARLIE>
Miss Elise built a nice grazin' field for the
animals. That young lady's got a heart o' gold.
